name: Verify an email adress with Icypeas (single)
description:
This template can be used to verify an email address with Icypeas. Be sure to have an active account to use this template. 



How it works
This workflow can be divided into three steps :
The workflow initiates with a manual trigger (On clicking 'execute').
It connects to your Icypeas account.
It performs an HTTP request to verify an email address.

Set up steps
You will need a working icypeas account to run the workflow and get your API Key, API Secret and User ID.
You will need an email address to perform the verification.
